message: Let's split 60/40. I believe this is a fair offer to start with.
Alice, your offer was a bit unbalanced. How about we switch it up this time? Remember, the clock is ticking and the money is losing value.
Bob, let's be reasonable. 55/45 is a good compromise. We're losing money with each round!
Alice, let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the fairest option.  We're both losing out with every rejected offer.
